name: Education Tools
description: Tools for learning, teaching, course creation, and educational content

tools.name: Khan Academy
tools.description: Free online learning platform with courses in math, science, programming, and more.

tools.name: Coursera
tools.description: Online learning platform partnering with universities to offer courses and degrees.

tools.name: Duolingo
tools.description: Gamified language learning platform with bite-sized lessons and progress tracking.

tools.name: Udemy
tools.description: Online marketplace for learning and teaching with thousands of courses on various topics.

tools.name: Anki
tools.description: Spaced repetition flashcard program for efficient memorization and long-term retention.

tools.name: Google Classroom
tools.description: Free web service for schools to create, distribute, and grade assignments paperlessly.

tools.name: Quizlet
tools.description: Study tool with flashcards, games, and practice tests for various subjects and topics.

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.description: AI-powered writing assistant for grammar checking, spell checking, and style suggestions.

tools.name: TED-Ed
tools.description: Educational video platform with animated lessons and customizable learning experiences.
